description: This file defines authentication-related API routes for a FastAPI application, including user registration and login endpoints. It handles user creation, authentication, and token issuance, and exposes two main POST endpoints: /auth/register and /auth/login.

classes.name: UserCreate
classes.description: Schema for user registration data, including email, password, and optional display name.

classes.name: UserLogin
classes.description: Schema for user login credentials, including email and password.

classes.name: UserOut
classes.description: Schema for user profile data returned to clients.

methods.name: dict register(data: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles registration of new users, creates user record, and returns access token and profile.

methods.name: dict login(credentials: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates existing users and returns access token and profile.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(credentials: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> dict:$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(data: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> dict:$/
